title: Diamond Jungler LFT
body:
I am looking for a ranked 5 team aiming for challenger that is willing to take me.
I am currently a Diamond 4 Jungler and have played in multiple small tournaments and am experienced in a team environment.
I am able to be a shotcaller for a team as well as planning picks/bans and strategies. 
My current comfort picks are Vi, Hecarim and Pantheon. My current pool also consists of Sejuani, Khazix and Warwick. I am able to play J4 and Lee Sin if necessary.  

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=aeri

If you are interested please contact me in client :D

replies.body: Hi, Fantasy Esports is Recruiting to make a Serious team if your interested. i'll add you in game and we can talk there
